title: Bright and Spacious Top Floor Inner Richmond Studio w/ Parking Avail.
posting_body: ['$2,095 | 380 5th Ave #C, San Francisco, CA 94118', 'This bright and spacious studio apartment with separate sleeping alcove (could be used as a jr. one bedroom) is conveniently located in Inner Richmond just a half block from the commercial corridor of Clement Street and Geary Blvd.', 'The apartment boasts hardwood floors throughout, an updated kitchen with gas oven/stove, huge walk-in closet & bay window.', 'Walk Score: 96 (walkers paradise)', 'KEY FEATURES:', '- Updated kitchen with gas stove', '- Hardwood floors throughout', '- Huge walk-in closet', '- Large bay window lets in great natural light', '- Parking available for an additional $200/mo', 'TERMS:', '1 year lease', 'Security Deposit = 1 month + $500', 'Water included, tenant pays garbage and PG&E', 'Cats OK w/ additional deposit', 'Sorry, No Dogs', 'Available now!', 'Contact Brett for more information or to schedule a tour!', 'Online application available upon request.', 'Brett van den Eikhof', 'DRE #01910306', 'brett@gaetanirealestate <URL>)', 'For more units available, visit <URL>', 'This unit is a rental unit subject to the San Francisco Rent Ordinance, which limits evictions without just cause, and which states that any waiver by tenant of their rights under the rent ordinance is void as contrary to public policy.']
